dict.string: - All tags associated with an item can be erased by setting the mode to Overwrite and leaving the tags empty. - The tag window now sorts the tag lists by name to make it easier to find a single tag in large listing. - Bug Fix: Bumped the threshold needed to show the BADAUTH alert and made the alert non-modal so track plays are recognized while it's on screen. - Other minor changes and bug fixes. 1.5b2 - Previously played Tracks/Artists can be Loved, Banned, Tagged, and Recommended from the Top Lists window. - You can view and change your recently Loved/Banned tracks. - The top three fans are now listed in the Artist Detail window. 1.5b1 - The currently playing track can be Loved, Banned, Tagged, and Recommended from the Stats window. (10.4+ only) - Removed "Your Fan Rating" from the Artist Details, and replaced it with a listing of the Artist tags (fully clickable). 1.2.2b2 - The Top Lists profile now includes the elpased time since the last profile reset. - Growl track notification layout change. - Bug Fix: Top Tracks search field was mis-behaving. b1: - A profile reset now requires confirmation. - Bug Fix: The auto version update check is now silent if there is no update. - Bug Fix: It was possible for the submission countdown in the Stats window to get confused and display a completely invalid time. - Bug Fix: The authentication warning dialog will now display when necessary.
